!Priest of the Earth Daichir: True, it is good to know all the details about the job. You know, the task is not simple. Eliminate the Earth Worm Trasken is not so easy. He's incredibly mighty opponent, fight with him at the time of the peak of his power is meaningless. Therefore, we must strike a blow at the moment when the influence of the Shilen on this thing off. To do this, we collect under its banner all Gnomes who live in adjacent lands. [Quest _478_NightmareOfDwarves 30537-9.htm|Listen more]
